entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
